name: Interviewer AI
description: At Interviewer.AI, we build Explainable AI to bring the most transparent and user-friendly smart hiring solution to your company. We help recruitment teams to identify desirable candidates during the entire talent acquisition process. An Explainable AI approach allows to highlight candidates’ key performance factors and minimize the risk of making biased decisions. The online video interviewing software cuts the time of unnecessary pre-interviews, giving businesses more time to focus on what’s really important – their company. The software is powered by top-notch AI hiring technology, analyzing key factors of potential candidates, including psychological and technical aspects.
business_objectives: Reduce the Cost of Hiring Qualified Employees
Headline: Smart Video Recruiter
ShortDescription: Interviewer.AI is an AI-powered video recruitment software that helps you, pre-screen candidates before scheduling them for face-to-face interviews. It also offers an interview-coaching platform for students and universities.
enhanced_description: Interviewer AI provides an Explainable AI-powered online video interviewing software designed to streamline the talent acquisition process. It helps recruitment teams identify desirable candidates by analyzing key factors, including psychological and technical aspects, through its top-notch AI hiring technology. The solution aims to cut down unnecessary pre-interview time, pre-screen candidates effectively before face-to-face interviews, and minimize biased decisions by highlighting candidate performance factors. Additionally, Interviewer AI offers an interview-coaching platform specifically for students and universities.
competitive_advantages: Explainable AI for transparent and unbiased hiring decisions
Comprehensive AI analysis of psychological and technical candidate factors
Focus on future-ready and efficient AI-driven processes
roi_benefits: Reduced cost of hiring qualified employees
Minimized risk of biased hiring decisions
